main event: Light descending vertically into water, bright white color, bright red-white light, auto headlight, moving very fast.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a natural phenomenon, not an aircraft or astronomical object.
Several pilots on different flights reported seeing similar unidentified objects in the same area around the same time.
The objects were described as bright lights, some with smaller lights surrounding a larger light, moving at high speeds.
The objects performed maneuvers that were described as impossible for any known aircraft.
The sightings lasted for up to 15 minutes, with the objects disappearing suddenly at high speeds.
sighted object: Bright light, described as looking like a headlight, descending vertically into the water
